Uses of Class
ch.phonon.PointInPictureBase

  • Packages that use PointInPictureBase 
    Package Description
    ch.phonon  

    • Uses of PointInPictureBase in ch.phonon

      Subclasses of PointInPictureBase in ch.phonon 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LocalOrientation
      Instances of the class LocalOrientation store information about the local orientation/position of a Drawable relative to the StarPoint.
      class  StarPoint
      A StarPoint represents the global location of an object in reference to the global coordinate system in the pictureSystem base .
